attributes.action: allow only English speaking migrant workers to enter the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is now accepted by informed observers that there is a net loss to the UK economy under the present arrangements whereby unskilled, non-English speaking, foriegn nationals are allowed to seek work in the UK unchecked. This group must surely tend to be the least likely to gain employment and therefore the most likely recipients of UK state benifits and free education. We owe it to people to deter them from coming to the UK when they are so ill-equipped to join in with our way of life.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
